articles.author: Jack Johnson
articles.title: Lynch dominates in 1-0 win over Detroit - Royals Review
articles.description: That was refreshing to see.
articles.content:
In an old school pitchers duel, the Royals bested the Tigers 1-0 on Tuesday night at Comerica Park. The win marks No. 20 for Kansas City on the year.
